title: @Riot I need 10 RP
body: I need 10 RP to buy a gangplank skin and gangplank. So if you would do that i will appreciate.{{champion:41}}

replies.body: Sad that no one is responding on support ticket.....
They require a couple days. :/ FeelsBadMan. Took em a week to respond to mine.

We'd like to help with your specific request!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport), and we'll see what we can do!
